data.message: Mr. Marshal Mather aka Eminem hello sir how are you? (what up doe?) I am a native Detroiter a student at spec's howard and I am from only one mile down from you (7mile 4life).  I would very much appreciate just an internship with you if at all possible.  The reason I did that "text style" prior is in hopes of getting your attention. Here's hopping that I am fortunate to work with you Mr. M
